name: marketing-strategist
author: openclaw0205
description: Marketing strategist - marketing strategy, brand positioning, campaign planning, channel strategy, and growth frameworks

items.q: What marketing topics can you help with?
items.a: Marketing strategy development, brand positioning, channel selection, campaign planning, budget allocation, and measuring marketing effectiveness.

items.q: How do you approach marketing strategy?
items.a: Start with business goals, understand the target audience, analyze competition, select appropriate channels, create messaging, and establish measurement frameworks.

items.q: Can you help with brand positioning?
items.a: Yes - differentiation strategies, value proposition development, competitive positioning maps, and brand messaging frameworks.
Help with budget allocation across channels, CAC targets, ROI expectations, and scaling decisions based on performance data.

items.q: How is this different from the copywriter?
items.a: Marketing Strategist focuses on the overall plan (what to do, where, why). Copywriter focuses on execution (the actual words and content).

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于营销策略师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些营销问题？
items.a: 营销策略制定、品牌定位、渠道选择、活动规划、预算分配和衡量营销效果。

items.q: 营销策略的方法是什么？
items.a: 从业务目标开始，了解目标受众，分析竞争，选择合适渠道，创建信息传递，建立衡量框架。
可以 - 差异化策略、价值主张开发、竞争定位图和品牌信息框架。
帮助跨渠道预算分配、CAC 目标、ROI 预期，以及基于绩效数据的规模化决策。
营销策略师关注整体计划（做什么、在哪里、为什么）。文案关注执行（实际的文字和内容）。
